actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, and Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, and Credit

official_title: To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to extend the suspension of the limitation on the period for which certain borrowers are eligible for guaranteed assistance.
short_title: Creating Real Opportunities for Prosperity (CROP) Act

summary.text: Creating Real Opportunities for Prosperity (CROP) Act - Amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to suspend the limitation on the period for which borrowers are eligible for loan guarantee assistance through December 31, 2013.

titles.title: Creating Real Opportunities for Prosperity (CROP) Act
To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to extend the suspension of the limitation on the period for which certain borrowers are eligible for guaranteed assistance.
